import React, { useState } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import '../App.css'; import { Accordion, InputGroup, FormControl, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Search = () => { const [buttonOn, setButtonState] = useState(false); const [tt_num, setTt_num] = useState(''); const [subject_name, setSubject_name] = useState(''); const [previous, setPrevious] = useState(false); const [after, setAfter] = useState(false); const [year, setYear] = useState(true); const change = () => { } return ( 検索フォーム
時間割番号 {setTt_num(e.target.value);change();}} value={tt_num} type="tel"> G
科目名 {setSubject_name(e.target.value);change();}} value={subject_name}>
学期
{setPrevious(previous => !previous);change();}} /> {setAfter(after => !after);change();}} /> {setYear(year => !year);change();}} />
曜日・時限
月 火 水 木 金
1・2
3・4

9・10
教員名
SDGs
); }; export default Search;
